verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Great is Your faithfulness
Great is Your faithfulness
You never change
You never fail, O God

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
True are Your promises
True are Your promises
You never change
You never fail, O God

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
So we raise up holy hands
To praise the Holy One
Who was and is and is to come

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Wide is Your love and grace
Wide is Your love and grace
You never change
You never fail, O God

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
You were, You are
You will always be
